member.name: T:RicOneApi.Api.Authenticator

member.summary: Singleton instantiation.

member.summary: Establish connection to authenticate to OAuth server.

member.summary: POST to authentication server with provided credentials.

member.summary: Re-authenticates with authentication server if token is expired.

member.summary: Retrieve an application's token.

member.summary: Details of a specific endpoint by providerId.
member.returns: A list of type Endpoint by specified providerId.

member.name: M:RicOneApi.Api.Authenticator.GetEndpoints
member.summary: A list of all endpoints an application is associated with and it's details.

member.name: M:RicOneApi.Api.Authenticator.GetEndpoints(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Details of a single endpoint if returnAllEndpoints set to false. If returnAllEndpoints is true, details of all endpoints associated to application are returned.

member.returns: A list of type Endpoint if Boolean set to true otherwise a single endpoint.

member.summary: A single endpoint an application is associated with and it's details.

member.summary: For testing token validation

member.summary: For testing token validation, set in RestReturn class
